channel.title: Please help me!
channel.description:
-------------------------------------
Code: Server Features: All Combat Types - Range, Mage, Melee, Prayer. Most Skills - I still need to add Agility, Slayer, Thieving & RuneCrafting Ancient Magicks with the graphics! Use ecto tokens instead of bloods! Easy places to train! ::wildtrain ::hightrain ::hightrain2 A proper economy! Rares rise & they can even crash! Just like real RS! Dragon Smithing, this includes the D-Axe. Extra smithing: You can smith Crystal Bows, Rune Boots, Granite Mauls, Granite Legs & Granite Shields! Barrows! Not proper barrows (yet), but you have the chance to fight the brothers & hope for drops! Plenty of NPCs, most of which drop items, rare & non-rare. Better Crystal Key system, there is a phat set(without blue) in the chest, but 50 other Items which can be good or bad! Pking with wilderness levels. Pking is almost like REAL RS pking. NPCs that give you little hints & some say weird/funny stuff. ::elemental & ::smithgold is removed so people have to actually work for their stuff. A Rare's store so you can buy + sell all your rares! RUNECRAFTING skill! Type ::rc Able to turn into objects! Such as ::cart! FIVE different training area's! ::wildtrain ::hightrain ::hightrain2 ::deserttrain ::dungeon A mage bank teleport! ::mbi (Inside MB) and ::mbo (Outside MB)! ------------------------------------- ok.....im trying to fix up my site...and add new stuff to it...so where do i put that code at?

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“craterbear, post:3, topic:6729”]I put no for the poll :D[/quote]You’re bringing up topics from 2006 for no reason. Read the dates when you post in topics.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @skater7723 skater7723
item.description:
@skater7723 wrote:

Code:
Server Features:
All Combat Types - Range, Mage, Melee, Prayer.
Most Skills - I still need to add Agility, Slayer, Thieving & RuneCrafting
Ancient Magicks with the graphics! Use ecto tokens instead of bloods!
Easy places to train! ::wildtrain ::hightrain ::hightrain2
A proper economy! Rares rise & they can even crash! Just like real RS!
Dragon Smithing, this includes the D-Axe.
Extra smithing: You can smith Crystal Bows, Rune Boots, Granite Mauls, Granite Legs & Granite Shields!
Barrows! Not proper barrows (yet), but you have the chance to fight the brothers & hope for drops!
Plenty of NPCs, most of which drop items, rare & non-rare.
Better Crystal Key system, there is a phat set(without blue) in the chest, but 50 other Items which can be good or bad!
Pking with wilderness levels.
Pking is almost like REAL RS pking.
NPCs that give you little hints & some say weird/funny stuff.
::elemental & ::smithgold is removed so people have to actually work for their stuff.
A Rare’s store so you can buy + sell all your rares!
RUNECRAFTING skill! Type ::rc
Able to turn into objects! Such as ::cart!
FIVE different training area’s! ::wildtrain ::hightrain ::hightrain2 ::deserttrain ::dungeon
A mage bank teleport! ::mbi (Inside MB) and ::mbo (Outside MB)!

ok…im trying to fix up my site…and add new stuff to it…so where do i put that code at?

Read full topic
